list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the lowest part or edge of something, especially the part on which it rests or is supported.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she sat down at the base of a tree

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a conceptual structure or entity on which something draws or depends.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: cơ sở kinh tế của thị trấn sụp đổ

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a place used as a center of operations by the armed forces or others; a headquarters.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the corporal headed back to base
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Corporal quay trở lại căn cứ

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a main or important element or ingredient to which other things are added.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: soaps with a vegetable oil base
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: xà phòng với một cơ sở dầu thực vật

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a substance capable of reacting with an acid to form a salt and water, or (more broadly) of accepting or neutralizing hydrogen ions.
the middle part of a bipolar transistor, separating the emitter from the collector.
the root or stem of a word or a derivative.
a number used as the basis of a numeration scale.
one of the four stations that must be reached in turn to score a run.
have as the foundation for (something); use as a point from which (something) can develop.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the film is based on a novel by Pat Conroy
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Bộ phim dựa trên một cuốn tiểu thuyết của Pat Conroy

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: situate as the center of operations.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: một ban nhạc có trụ sở tại London

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of a person or a person's actions or feelings) without moral principles; ignoble.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the electorate's baser instincts of greed and selfishness
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Bản năng bậc bầu cử của lòng tham và ích kỷ

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: denoting or befitting a person of low social class.
(of coins or other articles) not made of precious metal.
